# inputDescriptionsByName

**Instance Property**

A dictionary of input feature descriptions, which the model keys by the input’s name.

## Declaration

```swift
var inputDescriptionsByName: [String : MLFeatureDescription] { get }
```

## Accessing feature descriptions

- **stateDescriptionsByName**: Description of the state features.
- **outputDescriptionsByName**: A dictionary of output feature descriptions, which the model keys by the output’s name.
- **MLFeatureDescription**: The name, type, and constraints of an input or output feature.

items.description: A dictionary of output feature descriptions, which the model keys by the output’s name.
items.name: outputDescriptionsByName

items.description: The name, type, and constraints of an input or output feature.
